text: Pseudotyped virions and single round infection
293T cells ( 1 x 107 ) were transfected with pNL4-3 .
R-E - ( 10 microg ) together with pHXB2 <extra_id_0> Env <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 10 microg ) , and 48-h post - transfection cell supernatant was collected .
Enzyme - linked immunosorbent assay ( ELISA ) using anti-p24 antibody measured virion concentration .

PBMCs , Jurkat or U937 cells ( 5 x 107 ) were infected with HXB2 <extra_id_0> Env <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - pseudotyped virions ( 500 ng of <extra_id_0> p24 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) by spinoculation , as previously described ( 50 ) .
